basics.name: Plamen Mitev
basics.label: Front-End Game Developer
basics.summary: Front-End Game Developer with a focus on high-performance JavaScript/TypeScript game engines. Specialist in iGaming/Slot mechanics, UI systems, and optimized animations using Pixi.js and GSAP. Proven track record of delivering 60fps interactive experiences in fast-paced production environments.

work.name: Evolution
work.summary: Engineering high-performance front-end systems for online slot games using TypeScript, Pixi.js, GSAP, Spine, and AdobeAnimate.
highlights: Architected and implemented interactive UI flows and complex game logic for high-traffic slot titles.
Optimized WebGL rendering pipelines and asset management, significantly reducing load times and memory overhead.
Engineered reusable animation components with GSAP, ensuring visual consistency and high production 'juice'.

work.name: Wiener Games
work.summary: Developed slot games using TypeScript, Cocos Creator, Pixi.js, and Spine.
highlights: Implemented slot mechanics such as reel spinning, symbol evaluation, and bonus triggers.
Built reusable UI components and animation systems for multiple game projects.
Improved game performance by optimizing update loops, asset loading, and scene transitions.

work.name: Spark Networks
work.summary: Developed high-traffic landing pages and web platforms using React, Svelte, TypeScript, and PHP.
highlights: Designed and developed project proposals and architectural improvements to reduce technical debt.
Mentored junior developers and established best practices for SEO and web performance.
Implemented performance enhancements that significantly improved PageSpeed scores and user retention.

work.name: Alokai (Altagram)
work.summary: Developed a SaaS platform for managing game localization projects using React and TypeScript.
highlights: Collaborated in an Agile environment to convert complex design wireframes into reusable React components.
Worked closely with product teams to implement features for internal game management tools.

work.name: Altagram
work.summary: Assisted in building a SaaS platform for game localization management using React, TypeScript, Python, and Bootstrap.
highlights: Collaborated within an Agile team to develop and package a design system for internal use, improving UI consistency.
Converted complex design wireframes into modular, reusable React components.
Contributed to feature prioritization and scoping to ensure high-impact project delivery.
Resolved critical bugs and performance issues across the platform's front-end architecture.
